definition: elderly man/father/father-in-law/neck feathers of a bird (old)

sentences.english: I found myself, at 81, an instant billionaire.
sentences.chinese: 我发现我自己以一位81岁的亿万富翁。

sentences.english: The day a Chinese multi-billionaire takes over Hollywood will be the time hell freezes over.
sentences.chinese: 中国亿万富翁接管好莱坞的那一天地狱都会冻结。

sentences.english: Billionaire mansions are often built like this.
sentences.chinese: 亿万富翁的公寓一般都建成这样。

sentences.english: Cheung Kong (Holdings) Ltd., controlled by billionaire Li Ka-shing, also took part.
sentences.chinese: 亿万富翁李嘉诚控制的长江基建也参与了其中。

sentences.english: And therein lies the problem for this self-made billionaire.
sentences.chinese: 这个白手起家的亿万富翁也面临着问题。

sentences.english: Two friends were at a party held at the mansion of a billionaire.
sentences.chinese: 两位友人参加了一个在亿万富翁的豪宅里举行的聚会。

sentences.english: If this guy is a billionaire, I'm a Dutchman.
sentences.chinese: 假如这家伙是个亿万富翁，我就是浑蛋。

sentences.english: They debuted as billionaires at ages 30 and 31.
sentences.chinese: 他们以30和31岁的年纪初次成为亿万富翁。

sentences.english: Don’t vote if you support 90 day detention without charge.
sentences.chinese: 别投票，如果你支持亿万富翁的偷逃税行为。

sentences.english: I do not believe that billionaire and I have unattainable distance.
sentences.chinese: 我不相信亿万富翁与我有不可企及的距离。

sentences.english: College dropouts show up and become billionaires a few years later.
sentences.chinese: 大学辍学生们来到这里，几年后就成为了亿万富翁。

sentences.english: You are not just watching a cable bio about a zillionaire rap mogul.
sentences.chinese: 你不只是看一个电缆约是亿万富翁说唱大亨生物。

sentences.english: The billionaire families also taught me about keeping costs down in business.
sentences.chinese: 从亿万富翁家庭那，我明白了要降低业务成本。

sentences.english: Billionaires swarmed into Nice to splurge millions during the summer holidays.
sentences.chinese: 暑期休假时，亿万富翁们群趋尼斯挥霍了百万巨款。

sentences.english: A minority of shrewd billionaires have succeeded in prospering despite the tumultuous conditions.
sentences.chinese: 有少数精明的亿万富翁得以在动荡的环境中获取成功。

sentences.english: So I started looking at the lives of other billionaires.
sentences.chinese: 所以我开始关注其他亿万富翁的生活。

definition: Warren Buffett (1930-), the Sage of Omaha, US investor and philanthropist, principal owner of holding company Berkshire Hathaway
Monopoly (game)/known as 大富翁[Da4 fu4 weng1] in PRC
to build up from nothing/to start from scratch
George Soros or György Schwartz (1930-), Hungarian American financial speculator and millionaire philanthropist
